text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Knowingly" means having knowledge of the character and content of the matter.
"Sadomasochistic abuse" has the meaning stated in § 11-101 of this title.
"Sexual conduct" has the meaning stated in § 11-101 of this title.
"Sexual excitement" has the meaning stated in § 11-101 of this title.
